name: EventMetadata
doc: Common event metadata used by all domain events. Contains technical/observability fields separate from business payload.

fields.name: event_type
fields.doc: Type of the event (e.g., CategoryCreated, CategoryUpdated)

fields.name: source
fields.doc: Source service that produced the event

fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: Event creation timestamp in milliseconds since epoch

fields.name: trace_id
fields.doc: OpenTelemetry trace ID for distributed tracing

fields.name: correlation_id
fields.doc: Correlation ID for request tracking across services

name: CategoryUpdatedEvent
doc: Event emitted when a category is updated

fields.name: metadata
fields.doc: Event metadata containing technical and observability fields

fields.name: payload

type.name: CategoryUpdatedPayload
type.doc: Business data for category update event

fields.doc: Category business data after the update
